Name: justinhj
AboutMe:
Programming for fun since I was about 7, and professionally since the early 90's. Working in the entertainment software business: Areas of expertise span video games, graphics and animation, AI and multimedia, as well as database and web development.

My most recent experience has been working with Chinese, Korean and North American operators of the free to play online video game "Company of Heroes". Working on low level server code, high level data design and cluster architecture, as well as leading the integration of the payment systems and user authorization with the systems of our business partners. . Most of my experience is in C/C++, Java, MySQL but I also have experience with Python, Java, C#, and Javascript

For fun I study and experiment with Common Lisp and Haskell, write blog posts on mostly linux and emacs tips, run and participate in open source projects, and maintain a widely used implementation of the A* search algorithm.
